welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Buzen, Japan! Known for its beautiful landscapes and rich cultural heritage, Buzen awaits you with open arms. Immerse yourself in our city's charm and discover all the wonders it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kita Kyushu Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kita Kyushu Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ube Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ube Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting the network and following the prompts.
